file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-10-02-02 - MAIN-LANDING-GEAR SHOCK ABSORBER - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-LANDING-GEAR SHOCK ABSORBER - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to restore the Main Landing Gear (MLG) shock absorber. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MLG SHOCK ABSORBER - RESTORA- ALL 32-10-02-900-801-A ♦ TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-10-02 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-02-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MLG SHOCK ABSORBER - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the latest revision of Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1187 to restore the MLG shock absorber. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION SHOCK ABSORBER OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR - AMM TASK 32-10-02-000-801-A/400 REMOVAL SHOCK ABSORBER OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR - AMM TASK 32-10-02-400-801-A/400 INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the MLG shock absorber ( AMM TASK 32-10-02-000-801-A/400). J. Restore MLG Shock Absorber (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Refer to the latest revision of Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1187 to restore the MLG shock absorber. K. Follow-on (Figure 201) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the MLG shock absorber ( AMM TASK 32-10-02-400-801-A/400).
